casebody.data:
No. 10-7554. Santiago Mendoza, Petitioner v. Walter A. McNeil, Secretary, Florida Department of Corrections. 563 U.S. 913, 131 S. Ct. 1810,

179 L. Ed. 2d 672,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 2490. March 28, 2011.

Petition for rehearing denied.

Former decision, 562 U.S. 1186, 131 S. Ct. 1013, 178 L. Ed. 2d 841, 2011 U.S. LEXIS 754.
